entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
